inputs.name: source_repo
inputs.description: GitHub repo slug or full url

inputs.name: destination_repo
inputs.description: GitHub repo slug or full url

inputs.name: ssh_private_key
inputs.description: SSH key used to authenticate with source and destination ssh urls provided (optional if public or https url with authentication)

inputs.name: source_ssh_private_key
inputs.description: SSH key used to authenticate with source ssh url provided (optional if public or https url with authentication)

inputs.name: destination_ssh_private_key
inputs.description: SSH key used to authenticate with destination ssh url provided (optional if public or https url with authentication)

latest_release.name: feat: add support for source/destination ssh keys
